title: Login Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to login into milb site:
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Type user name on Username field.
2. Type password on Password field.
3. Check "Remember me" option check box.
4. Click on "Sign In" button.
custom_expected:
THEN

- User should be able to write user name on Username page.
- User should be able to write password on password field.
- User should be able to check "Remenber me" option.
- clicking on "Sign in" should submit the request.

title: Need help signing in?
custom_steps:
WHEN

Following should be visible on this section:

Forgot password?
Terms of Use
Privacy Policy
Help
custom_expected:
THEN

All the links should be present and visible on this section.
